actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to permit payments made to farmers in the case of 1974 and 1975 crops of wheat, feed grain, and cotton to reflect changes during the calendar years 1973 and 1974, respectively, in prices paid by farmers for production items, interest, taxes, and wage rates.

summary.text: Permits payments made to farmers in the case of 1974, 1975, and 1976 crops of wheat, feed grain, and cotton to reflect changes during the calendar years 1973, 1974, and 1975 respectively, in prices paid by farmers for production items, interest, taxes, and wage rates.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to permit payments made to farmers in the case of 1974 and 1975 crops of wheat, feed grain, and cotton to reflect changes during the calendar years 1973 and 1974, respectively, in prices paid by farmers for production items, interest, taxes, and wage rates.
